title: why is the league community both salty and sensitive af at the same time?
body:
"wahhhh reported wahhhh you're bad"

mostly silver kids have this behavior and the sad truth is is that if you're silver, objectively you are bad. you are what? the bottom 50 percent of the player base? thats like a F. just accept it and quit being so hypersensitive

replies.body: This might sound weird, but it probably is because the league community is fucking huge and not a tight community at all. So you have a lot of players that are sensitive and a lot of players that are salty. It is actually perfectly logical that a huge community can be whiny and salty at the same time

>mostly silver kids have this behavior and the sad truth is is that if you're silver, objectively you are bad. you are what?

I hate to break this to you, but if you're consistently getting matched with and against silver players, the mmr system believes you to be of similar skill level.

its question of pride and you can either be hypocrite or not but everyone who seek competition have their own pride and its something really precious so if someone come sully it or perceive like it according it to their way of thinking ,they can  either take it badly or just pass the way . I dont take you should really care about the community but yourself instead . You can like this improve and become a beautifull person who accomplish thing . {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Riot encourages and champions that mindset.
